title: client
body: after champ select when your loading in my screen goes black and nothing comes up. ive reinstalled ive reset ive done almost everthing someone plz help.

replies.body: This is a common symptom of a connection problem, with the black screen resulting from a failure to download assets and get you to the game server.  The steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide should fix this up!
